title: Free Champion Rotation

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I'm currently level 10 wanting to level up my account and I want to use the champs in this rotation but they won't show up for me and I'm confused on the reason why. Help is very appreciated! The link is that champs that are currently showing up.

replies.body: Hey there, free champion rotation should become available after level 10.  You'll see the current rotation on your next level up.  Sorry for the confusion!
No, its when player hit level 13. As one of riot staff u should know it
I am level 11, still have low level rotation.Bug?
